languages.text: Вольному Торговцу было сказано "искать второй Восход" — предположительно под этим подразумевается еще один осколок меча.
The Rogue Trader was told to "seek the Second Dawn" — presumably meaning another sword shard.
languages.original_text: Вольному Торговцу было сказано "искать второй Восход" — предположительно под этим подразумевается еще один осколок меча.

traits.locale_text: The Rogue Trader was told to "seek the Second Dawn" — presumably meaning another sword shard.

languages.text: {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} soll die 'Zweiten Dämmerung suchen' ... vermutlich ein weiterer Schwertsplitter.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader was told to "seek the Second Dawn" — presumably meaning another sword shard.

traits.locale_text: {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} soll die 'Zweiten Dämmerung suchen' ... vermutlich ein weiterer Schwertsplitter.

languages.text: {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} a reçu ordre de « rechercher la Seconde Aube », autrement dit un autre fragment de l'épée.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader was told to "seek the Second Dawn" — presumably meaning another sword shard.

traits.locale_text: {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} a reçu ordre de « rechercher la Seconde Aube », autrement dit un autre fragment de l'épée.

languages.text: {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente ha recibido órdenes de «buscar el Segundo Amanecer». Probablemente se trate de otro fragmento.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader was told to "seek the Second Dawn" — presumably meaning another sword shard.

traits.locale_text: {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente ha recibido órdenes de «buscar el Segundo Amanecer». Probablemente se trate de otro fragmento.

languages.text: 行商浪人得到了启示，要寻找新的黎明。或许，这指的是破晓锋刃的另一块碎片。
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader was told to "seek the Second Dawn" — presumably meaning another sword shard.

traits.locale_text: 行商浪人得到了启示，要寻找新的黎明。或许，这指的是破晓锋刃的另一块碎片。

languages.text: 自由開拓者は「第二の黎明を探せ」と言われた。おそらく他の剣の破片のことだろう。
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader was told to "seek the Second Dawn" — presumably meaning another sword shard.

traits.locale_text: 自由開拓者は「第二の黎明を探せ」と言われた。おそらく他の剣の破片のことだろう。

languages.text: Hür Tacir'e "İkinci Şafak'ı araması" söylendi, muhtemelen başka bir kılıç parçasından bahsediliyordu.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader was told to "seek the Second Dawn" — presumably meaning another sword shard.
